actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE public."users" SET
		"first_name" = '{{json_form_user.fieldState.first_name.isVisible ? json_form_user.formData.first_name : json_form_user.sourceData.first_name}}',
		"last_name" = '{{json_form_user.fieldState.last_name.isVisible ? json_form_user.formData.last_name : json_form_user.sourceData.last_name}}',
    "cpf" = '{{json_form_user.fieldState.cpf.isVisible ? json_form_user.formData.cpf : json_form_user.sourceData.cpf}}',
		"email" = '{{json_form_user.fieldState.email.isVisible ? json_form_user.formData.email : json_form_user.sourceData.email}}',
		"password" = '{{json_form_user.fieldState.password.isVisible ? json_form_user.formData.password : json_form_user.sourceData.password}}',
		"zip" = '{{json_form_user.fieldState.zip.isVisible ? json_form_user.formData.zip : json_form_user.sourceData.zip}}',
		"street" = '{{json_form_user.fieldState.street.isVisible ? json_form_user.formData.street : json_form_user.sourceData.street}}',
		"number" = '{{json_form_user.fieldState.number.isVisible ? json_form_user.formData.number : json_form_user.sourceData.number}}',
		"district" = '{{json_form_user.fieldState.district.isVisible ? json_form_user.formData.district : json_form_user.sourceData.district}}',
		"city" = '{{json_form_user.fieldState.city.isVisible ? json_form_user.formData.city : json_form_user.sourceData.city}}',
		"state" = '{{json_form_user.fieldState.state.isVisible ? json_form_user.formData.state : json_form_user.sourceData.state}}',
		"country" = '{{json_form_user.fieldState.country.isVisible ? json_form_user.formData.country : json_form_user.sourceData.country}}',
		"has_children" = '{{json_form_user.fieldState.has_children.isVisible ? json_form_user.formData.has_children : json_form_user.sourceData.has_children}}',
		"children_qty" = '{{json_form_user.fieldState.children_qty.isVisible ? json_form_user.formData.children_qty : json_form_user.sourceData.children_qty}}',
		"children_names" = '{{json_form_user.fieldState.children_names.isVisible ? json_form_user.formData.children_names : json_form_user.sourceData.children_names}}',
		"marital_state" = '{{json_form_user.fieldState.marital_state.isVisible ? json_form_user.formData.marital_state : json_form_user.sourceData.marital_state}}',
		"status" = '{{json_form_user.fieldState.status.isVisible ? json_form_user.formData.status : json_form_user.sourceData.status}}',
		"birthday" = '{{json_form_user.fieldState.birthday.isVisible ? json_form_user.formData.birthday : json_form_user.sourceData.birthday}}'
	WHERE "user_id" = {{table_collab.selectedRow.user_id}};
